      • startTurn

        public void startTurn(PlayerColor actor)
        Description copied from interface: TurnView
        Notifies that the given player started a new turn. If a turn is already started, then further calls to this method will mean that the game is asking the given player a revenge power up.
        Specified by:
        startTurn in interface TurnView

      • choosePayment

        public TurnView.ValOrUndo<PaymentReceiptData> choosePayment(PaymentInvoice invoice,
                                                            AmmoSet playerInv,
                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> cardIDs,
                                                            int fragmentToPay)
        Description copied from interface: TurnView
        Asks the user to choose a payment. The user can reject the payment (returning null), or choose what to use to pay, among ammos and power ups.
        Specified by:
        choosePayment in interface TurnView
        Parameters:
        invoice - The PaymentInvoice object representing the price.
        playerInv - An AmmoSet object containing the ammos that the player can use to pay.
        cardIDs - The ID of the power ups that can be used to pay
        fragmentToPay - An ID specifying what the user is going to pay.
        Returns:
